Read the raw file 2024_CSN_Fraud_Reports_by_Payment_Method.csv line-by-line, discarding blank lines.
Detect the header row as the first line that contains at least two non-empty comma-separated fields.
Collect subsequent lines as data until a line is reached that has fewer than two non-empty cells (marks end of table).
Strip spaces, commas, dollar signs, interpret K/M suffixes, and convert strings to numeric values (ints/floats), leaving other entries unchanged or as NaN.
After data cleaning, take the ' Total $ Loss' column and compute its sum.
Divide this sum by 1,000,000 to express the result in millions of dollars and cast it to int.
Print the resulting integer representing the total money defrauded over all payment methods.
